cofh.api.tileentity

Interface IReconfigurableSides


  • public interface IReconfigurableSides
    Implement this interface on Tile Entities which allow for reconfiguration of their sides. Coordination with the containing block is required.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean decrSide(int side)
      Decrement the config for a given side.
      int getNumConfig(int side)
      Returns the number of possible config settings for a given side.
      boolean incrSide(int side)
      Increment the config for a given side.
      boolean resetSides()
      Reset configs on all sides to their base values.
      boolean setSide(int side, int config)
      Set the config for a given side.

    • Method Detail

      • decrSide

        boolean decrSide(int side)
        Decrement the config for a given side.
        Parameters:
        side - The side to decrement.
        Returns:
        True if config was changed, false otherwise.

      • incrSide

        boolean incrSide(int side)
        Increment the config for a given side.
        Parameters:
        side - The side to decrement.
        Returns:
        True if config was changed, false otherwise.

      • setSide

        boolean setSide(int side,
              int config)
        Set the config for a given side.
        Parameters:
        side - The side to set.
        config - The config value to use.
        Returns:
        True of config was set, false otherwise.

      • resetSides

        boolean resetSides()
        Reset configs on all sides to their base values.
        Returns:
        True if reset was successful, false otherwise.

      • getNumConfig

        int getNumConfig(int side)
        Returns the number of possible config settings for a given side.
